H0.text: Grass to sleep in is needed by a cat to survive, as seen by Eduardo who observed cats living in an alley.

H1.text: Large trees to climb are necessary for a cat to survive, based on the observation that Eduardo saw some cats living in an alley.

H2.text: Predators to chase it are needed by the cats Eduardo saw living in the alley to survive.

H3.text: Small animals to eat are needed by a cat to survive, as observed by Eduardo who saw some cats living in an alley.

A4.text: Its retractable claws are adapted to killing small prey species such as mice and rats.

A5.text: It is an obligate carnivore, requiring a predominantly meat-based diet.
